attributes.action: Why should we continue to pay road tax when are roads are in such bad repair??
attributes.additional_details: Potholes are being logged with lancashire county council and there aim is 20 days for repair .There  are potholes as deep as 12mm and some are over 45 days without repair this is happening all over the county as the BBC breakfast news highlighted last week .They quoted 14 years to rectify our road this is unacceptable and can not be allowed.
attributes.background: The pothole situation is becoming unbearable for road users.We are expected to pay to use these roads but the state is causing damage to our vehicles and is endangering life. It is unacceptable to expect the british public to pay you for a service they are not recieving in return for their tax money
